timeline.bodyText: nit: since these are always true, should it just be interpolated string?
timeline.author: elfenheart

timeline.bodyText: Can you add a TODO to clean up these styles later once we verify that bootstrap doesn't override legend styles directly anymore.
timeline.author: itsanudeep

timeline.message:
[CDAP-16588] Downgrades material-ui library to 4.0.1

  - Backports Ingestion PluginsTable for 4.0.1 of material-ui
  - Fixes replicator UI for 4.0.1 downgrade
  - Fixes import in ThemeWrapper for 4.0.1 downgrade
  - Fix replicator stylings for material-ui upgrade revert
  - Fixes styling for runtime arguments in pipeline
